clauses.title: Notice of Termination
clauses.body:
Dear {{person_name}},

This letter confirms that your {{relationship_type}} relationship with {{company_name}} will end on {{termination_date}}. This decision has been made {{termination_reason}} and follows the {{notice_period}} notice period required under your agreement.

clauses.title: Reason for Termination
clauses.body: {{#if termination_reason == 'with cause'}}This termination is due to [specific reasons such as performance issues, policy violations, or misconduct]. We have previously discussed these concerns with you on [dates], and unfortunately, sufficient improvement has not been achieved.{{else if termination_reason == 'redundancy'}}This termination is due to redundancy as your role is no longer required due to business reorganization. This is not a reflection of your performance.{{else}}This termination is without cause as permitted under your agreement. We appreciate your contributions during your time with us.{{/if}}

clauses.title: Final Day & Transition
clauses.body: Your last working day will be {{termination_date}}. {{#if relationship_type == 'Employee'}}You may be placed on garden leave during the notice period at the Company's discretion.{{/if}} Please ensure all ongoing work is documented and transitioned appropriately. We will arrange handover meetings as needed.

clauses.title: Final Payment & Benefits
clauses.body: Your final payment, including {{#if relationship_type == 'Employee'}}salary, accrued holiday pay, and any applicable statutory payments{{else}}payment for work completed{{/if}}, will be processed on {{final_payment_date}}. {{#if relationship_type == 'Employee'}}Details of your P45 and pension arrangements will be provided separately.{{/if}}

clauses.title: Return of Company Property
clauses.body: Please return all Company property by {{termination_date}}, including: laptop, mobile phone, access cards, keys, documents, and any other Company materials. Failure to return items may result in deductions from your final payment where legally permitted.

clauses.title: Continuing Obligations
clauses.body: Your obligations regarding confidentiality{{#if relationship_type == 'Employee'}}, non-competition, and non-solicitation{{/if}} continue after termination as specified in your agreement. Please ensure you comply with these obligations to avoid legal action.

clauses.title: Reference
clauses.body: {{#if termination_reason != 'with cause'}}Upon request, we will provide a factual reference confirming your dates of employment and job title. For detailed references, please contact [HR contact].{{else}}References will be provided on a factual basis only, confirming dates and role.{{/if}}

clauses.title: Questions & Support
clauses.body: If you have any questions about this termination or the process, please contact [HR contact name] at [email/phone]. {{#if termination_reason == 'redundancy'}}We will provide support including [outplacement services/reference assistance] during this transition.{{/if}}

clauses.title: Closing

annotations.tooltip: Be clear and factual about termination reasons to minimize legal risk.
Ensure all final payments comply with employment law and contract terms.
Remind departing workers of post-termination obligations like confidentiality.
